owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Alba Fern√°ndez Izquierdo
Andrea Cimmino
owl:Ontology.terms:title: OpenADR ontology
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: This ontology describes the openADR protocol based on the documentation provided by the openADR Profile B

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially contains the object SpatialObject
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Duration of a signal interval
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: interval duration

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a target and its components
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an event and its metadata
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: event descriptor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an entity an its available period
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has active period

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Duration of an event
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has duration

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between an event and its status
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has event status

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an entity and the payload resource status
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has payload resource status

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a report and its payload
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has report payload

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the sampling rate of a report
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has sampling rate

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an entity and its signal
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has signal

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between a signal and the interval where it is active
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has interval

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an entity and its target
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has target

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Typical value of an interval
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has typical value

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation to indicate the units of a measurement
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is measured in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a DVN and its FEID
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: manages

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link to the source of a report
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: report data source

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a report and its metadata
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: report descriptor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Subject of a report
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: report subject

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A link between a VTN and the event it sends
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: send

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Attribute to determine whether or not data is sampled as it changes
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: is on change

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents the top-level feature type. This class is equivalent to GFI_Feature defined in ISO 19156:2011, and it is superclass of all feature types
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Feature

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class spatial-object represents everything that can have a spatial representation. It is superclass of feature and geometry.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SpatialObject

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Anything with spatial extent, i.e. size, shape, or position. e.g. people, places, bowling balls, as well as abstract areas like cubes
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Spatial thing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of Resource that represents a specific collection of physical loads. Resources can be composed of Assets, and an Asset may be Resource, but Assets cannot be further decomposed into multiple Assets or Resources.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Asset

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: These reports are used to report actual data that may be measured or calculated.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An event is a notification from the utility to demand side resources requesting load shed starting at a specific time, over a specified duration, and may include targeting information designating specific resources that should participate in the event
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Part of the OpenADR event object that describes metadata about the event, such as program name and event priority
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event descriptor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Status of an OpenADR event
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event status

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is usage history that can be transmitted using the well known GREEN BUTTON standard payloads
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Green button report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is a type of data report in which the history of the data point values is logged and can be subsequently requested
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: History report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: These are logs of usage data that are typically logged by VEN‚Äôs and can be queried by the VTN
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: History usage report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Units for the data in the report
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OASIS Energy Market Information Exchange (eMIX) standard
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Item base

owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
The metadata report can contain a specification for one or more type of reports, each report having its own set of report descriptors and specifications
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Metadata report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The expected response from the demand side resource owner upon receipt of an event.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Opt

owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Opt In

owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Opt Out

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Status of the payload resource
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Payload resource status

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Report sent from a VEN to a VTN to report the energy consumption or the status of Resources connected to the VEN
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Part of the OpenADR report object that describes metadata about the report
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report descriptor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Payload associated to every report
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report payload

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Entity that is enrolled in the DR Programs and is capable of delivering some sort of change to their load profile in response to receiving a DR signal from a VTN.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Resource

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The average number of samples obtained in one second
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sampling rate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Service Area expresses locations or geographic regions relevant to price communication
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OASIS Energy Market Information Exchange (EMIX)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Service Area

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The actionable information contained in an event such as electricity pricing or specific levels of load shed requested that typically trigger some preprogrammed load shed behavior by the recipient of the event.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Interval of time where a signal is active
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Interval

owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: Target of a signal or event
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Target

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The term telemetry in the context of OpenADR refers to data that is reported periodically in real time
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Telemetry report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is usage data that is periodically reported from the VEN to the VTN in real time
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Telemetry status report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the status of a resource, which may be periodically reported from the VEN to the VTN
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Telemetry usage report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the OpenADR Virtual End Node that is used to interact with the VTN
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Virtual End Node (VEN)

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the OpenADR Virtual Top Node that is used to interact with the Resources enrolled in the DR Programs.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Virtual Top Node (VTN)

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Value of a signal in a particular interval
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Value
